![nvctr](featured.png){width=20%}


The [`nvctr`](https://nvctr.ansperformance.eu/) R package implements the n-vector approach to geographical position calculations using
an ellipsoidal model of Earth as described in [@gadeNonsingularHorizontalPosition2010] (see also the
`n-vector` project page [@navigationgroupatffiNvectorPage2010].)
